author: Brodie Robertson
description:
In a recent merge request GNOME decided to disable middle click to paste and locked the MR before anyone realized it was happening, and also tried to make similar changes over on Firefox, well there's a lot to unpack here so lets take a look.

title: GNOME Disables Middle Click Paste, Chaos Ensues
